predicate.note: Frames file for 'sample' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

roleset.name: select a portion of a larger whole

example.name: active
example.text: He said 30% of the loans *trace* he sampled *trace* were ``dead meat on the day they were made.''

example.name: passive
example.text: Both reports are based on several thousand patients sampled *trace* in a 1985 nationwide government survey.
